examples.example: 我们每个人都应该为自己的梦想而努力奋斗。

translate.english: Each of us should strive hard for our own dreams.

examples.example: 我们在生活中应该多去帮助他人，这样世界会变得更加美好。

translate.english: We should help others more in life, so that the world will become more beautiful.

examples.example: 我们应该保持积极乐观的心态去面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: We should keep a positive and optimistic attitude to face all kinds of challenges in life.
